item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 1, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Static search trees: faster than binary search (215 points | 83 comments)
2. Happy New Year 2025 (223 points | 75 comments)
3. Arnis: Generate cities in Minecraft from OpenStreetMap (257 points | 47 comments)

5. I Reversed a Drone and Landed It with My PC (63 points | 14 comments)
6. The GTA III port for the Dreamcast has been released (311 points | 90 comments)
7. Déjà vu: Ghostly CVEs in my terminal title (63 points | 1 comment)
8. After a 24-second test of its engines, the New Glenn rocket is ready to fly (33 points | 32 comments)
9. The psychonaut field manual [pdf] (4 points | discuss)
10. India's food shortage filled American libraries (50 points | 12 comments)
11. Things we learned about LLMs in 2024 (563 points | 413 comments)
12. Building Game Prototypes with LÖVE (110 points | 41 comments)
13. Nvidia bets on robotics to drive future growth (12 points | 6 comments)
14. Signalling chaos: Inside the Elizabeth line's two-day breakdown (12 points | 4 comments)
15. Bench.co acquired after informing staff company was insolvent (26 points | 20 comments)
16. Morris Chang and the Origins of TSMC (194 points | 52 comments)

19. Revisiting the NetBSD Build System (84 points | 11 comments)
20. Finland Finds Anchor Drag Marks Left by Tanker That Broke Cables (20 points | 6 comments)
21. Systems ideas that sound good but almost never work (297 points | 182 comments)
22. Just Words (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)

24. Shallow Feedback Hollows You Out (18 points | 2 comments)
25. Lies. Damned Lies. P-value thresholds (35 points | 9 comments)
26. More telcos confirm Salt Typhoon breaches as White House weighs in (369 points | 310 comments)
27. I keep turning my Google Sheets into phone-friendly webapps (609 points | 207 comments)
28. Amiga Games Released in 2024 Index (60 points | 13 comments)
29. How to monitor your local weather with Grafana (177 points | 39 comments)
30. Dinner for One: British comedy Germans have been laughing at for years (2018) (118 points | 61 comments)
